items.content_html: # Leads Tracker Chrome Extension Effortlessly manage leads in Chrome. Save URLs or input data with one click, creating an organized list for easy access. Ideal for professionals tracking valuable resources or anyone wanting a simplified lead management solution. Explore streamlined lead tracking with this lightweight, user-friendly extension. 💼🚀
items.title: Hemanthkbmahadevappa/-simple-Chrome-extension-to-save-and-track-leads-: # Leads Tracker Chrome Extension  Effortlessly manage leads in Chrome. Save URLs or input data with one click, creating an organized list for easy access. Ideal for professionals tracking valuable resources or anyone wanting a simplified lead management solution. Explore streamlined lead tracking with this lightweight, user-friendly extension. 💼🚀
